definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The perturbation theory of the DNLS soliton with NVBCs has not been developed.
sentences.chinese: 非零边值的DNLS孤子微扰理论尚未建立。

sentences.english: The two solitons in one pair can interact with each other.
sentences.chinese: 形成这种孤子对的两个孤子之间可以发生相互作用。

sentences.english: The two solitons in one pair can interact with each other.
sentences.chinese: 形成这种孤子对的两个孤子之间可以发生相互作用。

sentences.english: The results show that the positive high-dispersion has contributed to the formation of asymptotic soliton in the optical fiber.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，高阶色散有助于光纤中渐近孤子的形成。

sentences.english: The fundamental soliton can be compressed in dispersion-managed fibers.
sentences.chinese: 在色散管理光纤中，基孤子脉冲司以被压缩。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, we develop a purely direct perturbation theory of dark solitons.
sentences.chinese: 在第三章中，我们发展了一种直接的暗孤子微扰理论。

sentences.english: Moreover, additional angular momenta are added to the off-axis propagating solitons.
sentences.chinese: 此外，轴外传输的孤子会获得附加的角动量。

sentences.english: We develop a direct approach to the soliton perturbation based on the separation variables.
sentences.chinese: 发展了一种以分离变量为基础的孤子微扰的直接方法。

sentences.english: Optical soliton transmission is one of the popular research briskest subjects in modern optical communication technology.
sentences.chinese: 当前光通信技术研究中的一个热点课题是光孤子传输。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the group velocity of the solitons is subluminal.
sentences.chinese: 同时孤子的群速度是慢光速。

sentences.english: In case the external bias field is absent, these solitons are similar to photovoltaic solitons in the open-circuit case.
sentences.chinese: 当不存在外电场时，它类似于开路条件下的光伏孤子。

sentences.english: The prominent feature of a double-charge soliton is that its potential peak splits into double peaks.
sentences.chinese: 双电荷孤子的显著特征是它的电势峰具有双峰结构。

sentences.english: The higher the pumping power, the more are the pairs of the vector soliton bunch.
sentences.chinese: 泵浦功率越高，裂变出来的矢量孤子簇对数越多。

sentences.english: Using the variational approach, we investigate the dynamics of the vector solitons.
sentences.chinese: 通过变分法，我们研究了矢量孤子的动力学。

sentences.english: Use of optical solitons singular characteristics, can achieve optical solitons communications.
sentences.chinese: 利用光孤子的奇异特性，可以实现光孤子通信。

sentences.english: Use of optical solitons singular characteristics, can achieve optical solitons communications.
sentences.chinese: 利用光孤子的奇异特性，可以实现光孤子通信。

definition: to be orphaned of one's father
to checkmate (in chess)/to be about to die
(of family members) separated from one another/scattered about/dispersed/(math.) discrete
